prompts.prompt: I need a script to launch a QEMU virtual machine that operates on the same WiFi network as the host system. The script should configure the virtual machine's network settings to ensure it appears as a separate device on the same network.
I need a bash script for Linux to start a QEMU virtual machine that uses the host PC's WiFi network. The script should ensure the virtual machine is connected to the same WiFi network as the host.
